description: This table contains the contents of Customer Relationship Management letters. Depending on the letter contents, extra formatting information may be included with the letter text.

columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: LETTER_TEXT
columns.description: Contains the content of the letter in plain text.
